info.name: Moonstone Veil Items
info.description: Magical artifacts and spell foci crafted from the power of the moonstone and the currents of the Ethereal Plane.
info.author: Emily P & Alexander P

description.p: While wearing this ring, you gain one 2nd-level spell slot per day. The ring regains the expended slot at dawn.
Each time you use this spell slot, roll a d20. On a roll of 1, the ring shatters and is destroyed.
